forum.name: guide
forum.description: the anyland guide with faq, frequently asked questions and their answers! help along, wiki style!

thread.title: disabling your mic

comments.text: you can disable your microphone to not be heard by going to the me menu's "..." settings and disabling "turn microphone on".
you can check if your mic is on at anytime by speaking in the main dialog of the me menu, which has volume indicators blinking green when you are heard.

thread.latestCommentText: you can check if your mic is on at anytime by speaking in the main dialog of the me menu, which has volume indicators blinking green when you are heard.
